3D Printing: 	* Utilize 3D printing technology to create physical copies of important documents, notes, or drawings.
Memory Palaces: 	* Encourage users to develop memory techniques inspired by the ancient practice of memory palaces.
Voice Recording: 	* Develop a voice recording app that allows users to record and save important information, ideas, or conversations.
Brainstorming Boards: 	* Design a digital brainstorming board platform that enables users to create, organize, and share ideas visually.
Augmented Reality: 	* Develop an augmented reality (AR) application that allows users to capture and save important information in a visual format.
